scripts.start: npm run start:services && sleep 10 && npm run deploy:local && npm run start:apps
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && cp ../.env.local .env && npm run dev
scripts.reset: npm run stop:services && npm run clean && npm run start
scripts.clean: docker-compose -f docker-compose.local.yml down -v && docker volume prune -f
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd contracts && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
